alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 12:38AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mellette, southeastern Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 145 AM MDT/245 AM CDT/... At 1238 AM MDT/138 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near George Town, or 19 miles south of Kadoka, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wanblee, Long Valley, Norris, Black Pipe, George Town and Eagle Nest Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
